exporter

Class BaseExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • exporter.BaseExporter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JDBCExporter

    public abstract class BaseExporter
extends java.lang.Object
    The BaseExporter represent an exporter of Loose associations. An exporter should have a method export with some parameters. We don't enforce here the export method because different export formats could have different parameters. We can think about different exporters to different formats. JDBC databases, CSV tables, XML and so on.
